<DOBBY_NOT_FASTTRAVEL>

parameters: Noble Ect: Thank you for coming today.

Clea: I'll get straight to the point, please tell us your
business.
Noble Ect: It's quite something, isn't it?

Noble Ect: Hahaha, I apologize for the rudeness. It's about
my collection of books in the room.

Noble Ect: There should definitely be documents related to
the ruins that Armada is searching for.

Noble Ect: Let's talk about something from a while ago. The
Crystal Mines of Valier were running dry, causing the men to
panic.

Noble Ect: I gathered books and had my son, who aspired to
be an archaeologist, investigate the place where the
crystals might be sleeping.

Noble Ect: Ignoring his son's objections, the men began
digging tunnels in the mountains where the demons rumored to
reside in Valier.
Thief Nora: That's what Armada was talking about...

Noble Ect: And the man who caused a major cave-in accident
lost everything in that accident and died in despair.

Noble Ect: ...That accident was caused by my father, and I
couldn't stop him.

Noble Ect: There are no conditions, but if there is one, I
want you to deliver the books to Armada without fail.

Clea: I can deliver them, but I can't guarantee that Armada
will use them.

Noble Ect: I don't mind, I just want to atone for my sins
towards her...

Noble Ect: She has been refusing it, but I want to do
something for Armada on my own.
Clea: Understood, I will take custody of the books.

Noble Ect: I apologize for my previous rude remarks.
Whenever Armada is involved, I tend to get heated.

Noble Ect: I wasn't able to be her partner... but I hope you
all can fulfill Armada's dream.
Noble Ect: I want you to help Armada.

Noble Ect: First of all, I apologize for everything. I was
about to do something irreversible.

Noble Ect: As a noble of the Valier family, I am willing to
accept any punishment, both as a member of the nobility and
as an individual.

Explorer Armada: That's right... I have two requests. First,
I will continue to dedicate myself to the Valier family and
contribute to its development.

Explorer Armada: If you become the leader, many people will
follow you. You must have the potential and passion for it,
right?

Noble Ect: Thank you, Armada. I will definitely regain the
passion in the hearts of the Valier people.

Explorer Armada: There's one more thing... It seems like
there are quite a few good books gathered here.

Explorer Armada: I plan to compile the research results of
this expedition into a book. I'm sorry, but I want you to
accompany me as my assistant!

Noble Ect: Are you really okay with this...? Even though
I... tried to take away your dream... You...

Explorer Armada: You know that I'm not good with writing,
right? Besides, it's been our dream since we were kids,
hasn't it?
Explorer Armada: I want to work together with you right now.
Noble Ect: ...If it's alright with me, I want to help.

Noble Ect: Sniff... You all must have something too. I'll
let you do anything you can.

Clea: My request is to hire the Chronos Thieves, whom I have
kept as my pets, as mercenaries.

Clea: If we can restore even a little bit of security in
Valier...
Noble Ect: Is that really enough?
Clea: We will obtain what we desire on our own.

Noble Ect: I understand, Armada... This is the soul that
Valier had lost, isn't it?

Explorer Armada: Yeah, we're shining brilliantly, aren't we?
The best companions who chased after our dreams together.

Explorer Armada: I'll take you to the entrance and we also
need to discuss the reward.

Noble Ect: Thanks to all of you, I have awakened from the
guilt I felt towards Armada and lost sight of many things...
Thank you so much.

Noble Ect: This may not be my true intention, but I would be
happy if you could use it as funds for our adventure.

Noble Ect: Thanks to all of you, I have awakened from the
guilt I felt towards Armada and lost sight of many things...
Thank you so much.

Noble Ect: And I can conduct research together with Armada!
There is no greater joy than this, I am truly, truly
grateful!

events.name: 貴族オリクトからの提案自動実行

parameters:
Chronos Thief Guild Leader Gift: I confirmed that the
adventurers from the Adventurer's Guild entered Armada's
house.

Chronos Thief Guild Leader Gift: If you move according to
the master's plan, it will be perfect--

Noble Oricto: Armada will definitely go to the ruins. She's
not someone who can sit still.

Chronos Thief Guild Leader Gift: Out of curiosity, how much
of what you told the guild members was true?

Noble Oricto: I genuinely want to cooperate in discovering
Armada's ruins with all my heart.

Noble Oricto: However, if the demon ruins are truly found,
it should become a new business that will save Valiere.

Noble Oricto: Valiere needs it. A new hope for the people
that will replace the crystals!

Noble Oricto: I will sell the rights to investigate the
discovered demon ruins at the appropriate location and at
the appropriate price.

Noble Oricto: My father was a madman possessed by the
crystals, but he was a true patriot who dedicated everything
for Valiere.

Noble Oricto: I will inherit that will... and I will
definitely save this corrupted Valiere.

Explorer Armada: I'm working quite comfortably! Just waiting
to live long enough for the book to be completed...
